issue.title: [Urban Feature] Add a bit more information to the simulation summary email

content.raw: I vote for this especially as I sometimes have problem to download the main simulation log file. In my case the best would be to attach content of `subt_tunnel_2019-10-03T20_29_05.768931684.log` with times, reported artifacts with success/failure and distances.
content.html: I vote for this especially as I sometimes have problem to download the main simulation log file. In my case the best would be to attach content of subt_tunnel_2019-10-03T20_29_05.768931684.log with times, reported artifacts with success/failure and distances.
